mapper.insert:
insert into lte_plane ( mENodeBID, mBaseStationName, mBaseStationType, mAltitude, mLongitude, mLatitude, mTac, testPerson, testPersonPhone, backPerson, backPersonPhone, testTime, createTime, createAt, dealPersonId, projId, status ) values (
#{mENodeBID}, #{mBaseStationName}, #{mBaseStationType}, #{mAltitude}, #{mLongitude}, #{mLatitude}, #{mTac}, #{testPerson}, #{testPersonPhone}, #{backPerson}, #{backPersonPhone}, #{testTime}, #{createTime}, #{createAt}, #{dealPersonId}, #{projId}, #{status} )
mapper.select: select mENodeBID as mENodeBID ,mAltitude as mAltitude ,mBaseStationName as mBaseStationName ,mBaseStationType as mBaseStationType ,mLongitude as mLongitude ,mLatitude as mLatitude ,mTac as mTac from lte_plane lp where dealPersonId =#{userId} and testTime =#{testDate} and projId =#{projId}
